duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the teacher in the classroom to include circle time, instructional time, and recess/lunch bunch time.
Integrate Biblical principles into the curriculum and work with the teacher to ensure students grasp the information being taught.
Prepare bulletin boards and demonstrate lesson concepts using chalkboards, media, hands-on materials, and computers.
Constant supervision of children in the classroom and on the playground for their safety and welfare, including understanding and directing children in case of emergency.

education_certification.credential: 6 ECE units, or equivalent experience desired
